text: @joncoopertweets No. Watching him pat himself on the back and wallow in self pity every day during the #coronavirus briefings is just ridiculous. I have never seen a more selfish, apathetic man in my life. He’s clueless as to what people are suffering with. He’s protected in his little bubble.😡
